name: ise-monogatari-translation
description: Ise Monogatari MCP: unified rules for literal translation, phrase-gloss, abbreviations, and natural translation.

translation_guidelines.literal_translation: Keep source word order and meanings. Avoid interpretation or additions.
translation_guidelines.natural_translation: Improve readability in modern Japanese/English while preserving content.
translation_guidelines.ise_rule_mukashi: Render 「むかし」 as "Once upon a time,".
translation_guidelines.kana_policy: Use modern kana where needed; keep classical morphology visible in gloss.
translation_guidelines.particles: Keep classical particles in the literal JP translation when feasible.
translation_guidelines.verbs: Mark conjunctive (renyo) forms with ADV in gloss.

gloss_guidelines.structure: Each phrase-gloss item has: phrase, gloss, words[].
gloss_guidelines.proper_nouns: Append .PN to gloss of proper names (e.g., Uji.PN).
gloss_guidelines.abbreviations_source: Prefer loading common-abbreviations.json; define only additions locally.

sample_entry.translation-en: Once upon a time, there was a man.
sample_entry.translation-en-natural: Once upon a time, there was a man.
